ModMetaData.name: Medical bay
ModMetaData.author: Gouda quiche
ModMetaData.description:
A medical bay that will tend and regenerate every unit you want in a room.
Adds : - 3 tiers of medical bay - 2 new ressources, medifuel and medistone - Draining tiles which in combination with a filth compressor, will keep a room clean
Credits to: - GenomX for giving me the medistone texture
Discussion thread: - https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=37908.0
